Uses of Class
net.derquinse.common.io.MemoryByteSourceLoader

  • Packages that use MemoryByteSourceLoader 
    Package Description
    net.derquinse.common.io  
    net.derquinse.common.util.zip  

    • Uses of MemoryByteSourceLoader in net.derquinse.common.io

      Methods in net.derquinse.common.io that return MemoryByteSourceLoader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MemoryByteSourceLoader MemoryByteSourceLoader.chunkSize(int chunkSize)
      Returns a loader with the same configuration and the chunk size specified by the argument.
      MemoryByteSourceLoader MemoryByteSourceLoader.direct(boolean direct)
      Returns a loader with the same configuration and the use of direct memory specified by the argument.
      static MemoryByteSourceLoader MemoryByteSourceLoader.get()
      Gets the default loader.
      MemoryByteSourceLoader MemoryByteSourceLoader.maxSize(int maxSize)
      Returns a loader with the same configuration and the maximum allowed size specified by the argument.
      MemoryByteSourceLoader MemoryByteSourceLoader.merge(boolean merge)
      Returns a loader with the same configuration and that merges the source after loading according to the provided argument.
      MemoryByteSourceLoader MemoryByteSourceLoader.transformer(ByteStreamTransformer transformer)
      Returns a loader with the same configuration and the transformer specified by the argument.

    • Uses of MemoryByteSourceLoader in net.derquinse.common.util.zip

      Methods in net.derquinse.common.util.zip with parameters of type MemoryByteSourceLoader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Function<ByteSource,MemoryByteSource> GZIP.gunzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader)
      Returns a function performing GZIP decompression.
      static Function<ByteSource,MemoryByteSource> GZIP.gzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader)
      Returns a function performing GZIP compression.
      ZipFileLoader ZipFileLoader.loader(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader)
      Returns a zip file loader with the provided memory loader and the same maximum loaded size.
      static Function<MemoryByteSource,MaybeCompressed<MemoryByteSource>> GZIP.maybeGzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader)
      Function version of GZIP.maybeGzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader, MemoryByteSource).
      static MaybeCompressed<MemoryByteSource> GZIP.maybeGzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader, MemoryByteSource input)
      Compress the input with gzip if the input is longer than 128 bytes and the output is smaller than the input.
